tasks.label: docker down
tasks.command: docker compose down && docker volume prune --force

tasks.label: migrate dev
tasks.command: docker compose exec backend pnpm migrate:dev

tasks.label: migrate:reset
tasks.command: docker compose exec backend pnpm migrate:reset

tasks.label: migrate:reset-and-seed
tasks.command: docker compose exec -T backend pnpm migrate:reset-and-seed

tasks.label: prisma generate
tasks.command: docker compose exec backend pnpm prisma generate

tasks.label: seed
tasks.command: docker compose exec backend pnpm seed

tasks.label: seed:production
tasks.command: docker compose exec backend pnpm seed:production
